title: Born equal
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Civil rights

Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Freedom of religion
description: Brief scenes are used to illustrate the meaning and purpose of the United Nations Declaration of Human Rights; that all people should be able to live their own lives as they desire with equality of opportunity, freedom of religion and speech, and with the tolerance of their fellow human beings. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
